desc_en: Time (in milliseconds) of a heartbeat interval.
Time (in milliseconds) for an election to timeout. See tuning documentation for details.
desc_zh: 选举超时的毫秒数，详情参考调优文档。

desc_en: Backend storage quota in bytes. When exceeded etcd raises the NOSPACE alarm and limits writes. 0 uses the built-in 2 GiB default, positive values apply an explicit quota, and negative values disable the quota (not recommended; max suggested is 8 GiB).
desc_zh: 以字节设定后端存储配额。超过该值时 etcd 会触发 NOSPACE 告警并限制写入。0 表示使用内置的 2 GiB 默认值，正数表示指定额度，负数会关闭配额（不推荐，官方建议不超过 8 GiB）。
